alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 9:30PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Collier, southeastern Hendry, northern Broward and central Palm Beach Counties through 1000 PM EST... At 930 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of Fremd Village-Padgett Island to Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Wellington, Jupiter, Palm Beach Gardens, Belle Glade, Tequesta, Okeelanta, Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge, Holey Land Wildlife Refuge, North County Airport, Loxahatchee Groves, Lion Country Safari Park, The Acreage, Loxahatchee NWR, Philo Farms, Limestone Creek, Caloosa, and Jupiter Farms. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EST for southern, southeastern and southwestern Florida.
